channel.title: Some questions
channel.description:
I am a noob at this so dont get made at me.
1ST. How do you move shops around or items or npcs?
2ND. How do you change the character respawn location?
3RD. How do you change the exp?
Thanks m0n 1337

item.title: Some questions
item.dc:creator: @i_noob_iii i noob iii
item.description:
@i_noob_iii wrote:

[quote=“m0n 1337, post:1, topic:316046”]I am a noob at this so dont get made at me.

1ST. How do you move shops around or items or npcs?

2ND. How do you change the character respawn location?

3RD. How do you change the exp?

Thanks m0n 1337[/quote]

  1. NPCS in autospawn.CFG items a shop sells in shops.CFG

  2. spawn location in player.java

  3. Change the exp of what?

EXP u get for hitting something would look somewhat like this

 if (FightType == 1) // Accurate
                        {
                            TotalExp = (double) (4 * hitDiff);
                            TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                            addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack);
                        } else if (FightType == 2) // Agressive
                        {
                            TotalExp = (double) (4 * hitDiff);
                            TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                            addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);
                        } else if (FightType == 4) // Defensive
                        {
                            TotalExp = (double) (4 * hitDiff);
                            TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                            addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence);
                        } else if (FightType == 3) // Controlled
                        {
                            TotalExp = (double) (4 * hitDiff);
                            TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                            addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);
                        }
                        TotalExp = (double) (1 * hitDiff);
                        TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                        addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerHitpoints);

Read full topic
